```{r load-data}
sediments <- read.csv(paste0("/cloud/project/data/datasets_csv/Texture_loc.csv"), header = T)
organics <- read.csv(paste0("/cloud/project/data/datasets_csv/Organics_loc.csv"), header = T)
```

```{r join-sediments-organics}
Organics_sed <- left_join(organics, sediments, by = "UNIQUE_ID")

glimpse(Organics_sed)
```


```{r}
Organics_sed %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = GEN_LOC_NM.x, SAMPLE_WT))+
  geom_col()+
  coord_flip()
```

```{r}
Organics_sed %>%
  filter(GEN_LOC_NM.x == "CAPE COD BAY") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = GEN_LOC_NM.x, y = CLAY_PCT))+
  geom_col()+
  coord_flip()
```
